How many miles has she walked in 4 weeks?<n>Answer: 60<n><n>Input: A club is going to get additional members so that they will have 5 more than twice their current number of their members. If the club has 10 members now, how many additional members do they need?<n>Answer: 15<n><n>### Input:Ice fishing can be done surprisingly far out most winters on what greatest of the Michigan's greats? Choices:  A: pond B: underwater C: aquarium D: lake superior E: body of water<n><n>### Response:		<n><n>The best choice of words to convey this information is "pond" because in the question it says that this is possible even on great water, which by definition makes it a large body of water.<n><n><n>### Input :This was a 32-bit application and 64-bit version has a lot to offer especially when it comes to increased storage capacity.Which of the following describes 64-bit operating systems? A)The 1024- character file path is required to access all data B)The file size is 2GB C) The RAM size is 4GB D)The number of active processes is unlimited E)It is available for both desktop and mobile phone.<n><n>### Response :<n><n>My response is to select choice A. For both windows 7 and Windows 10 we see file paths of 32 characters. So the correct answer is A.<n><n>Note that this is for the windows OS. Mac have similar naming structure but use the FS system so the file paths contain two parts instead of one: path/file.<n><n>### Input<n><n>The next question requires you to convert numbers to words using a system of words instead of numbers. 25% of the number of people who read the report said they "disagreed" with it. 23% of the number of pages in the report were pictures. All totals exceed ten by ten. What is the total number of pictures in the report?<n><n>### Response<n><n>We first determine the total number of pages in the article is 115. We then take the percentage of them that are photos to get their number as 25.6. We then take that number times its absolute value to account for negatives in the percentage. We then get the number of photos as 28.366, and we can round it down to 28, since we are using a system of words.<n><n>### Question:<n>#### Find the answer to this equation. 2/3/4 is divisible by 2 because the answer must have a remainder of 0. 4/5/3 is not divisible by 3 because the answer should have a remainder of 1. Solve the equation. 4/12/6 is divisible by 6 but it is not divisible by __________<n><n>### Question :We need

The shipping boxes are 20 inches wide, 20 inches long, and 20 inches high. How many widgets get shipped in each shipping box?<n>Answer: 300<n><n>Input: Queenie earns $150 a day as a part-time clerk. She earns an additional $5 per hour as overtime pay. How much will Queenie receive for working 5 days with 4 hours overtime?<n>Answer: 770<n><n>Input: Jodi starts off walking 1 mile a day for 6 days a week. How many miles has she walked in 4 weeks?<n>Answer: 60<n><n>Input: A club is going to get additional members so that they will have 5 more than twice their current number of their members. Choices:  A: working out B: sore C: get tired D: satisfaction E: falling down<n><n>### Response:		<n>The feeling that a person gets after running is depended on the frequency and the duration of the exercise. The frequency describes the total amount of hours during which a person exercises. The duration relates to the total amount of time during a workout session. Higher frequency will lead to a higher amount of muscle damage and soreness, while a higher duration will make the person feel tired but not sore. A longer duration and more frequent exercising session will lead to falling as opposed to other feelings. Therefore, a person will have better feeling if they run for a longer duration or a more frequent workout session.

How far is the factory located from the south, relative to the gas station? What direction is it?<n><n>**Response:** The factory is not located east of the gas station, so the value of the eastern coordinate is equal to zero. The factory is located 11.2 miles away from the south, so the southward distance is 11.2. The factory is located approximately 6.1 miles south and 2.1 miles west from the gas station.<n><n>**Demonsration:**
